title: Second post
except: This is some quick information about the post.
post:
Wouldn't you like to get away? Sometimes you want to go where everybody knows your name. And they're always glad you came! No phone no lights no motor car not a single luxury. Like Robinson Crusoe it's primitive as can be!

But they got diff'rent strokes. It takes diff'rent strokes - it takes diff'rent strokes to move the world. The mate was a mighty sailin' man the Skipper brave and sure.
